message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product for a one-time price of $9000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $7500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $8500. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $8500, so I'll offer $8250. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand you're still a bit hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm thinking of a price of $8800. It's a bit higher than your last offer, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
